name: Go find a job!
description:
You're looking for some job. You found a company called Critical Corp. that needs a guard at the entrance. Serious people should only enter.

You can open both the left and right door to let people in and out. You can gently ask people to get out by using the speaker and lock in jail people that don't follow your instructions by touching the alarm.

Try to not make mistakes, get hired, or not...

Find the 4 endings.
